name: Happy Hoop-Win Big Rewards
description:
Happy Hoop is a free, entertaining game, where you could earn surprises by shooting the balls into the hoop. But don't worry if you're not good at making shots. Every shot you missed would turn into a coin and eventually goes to your box.

Features:
1: A brand new combination of basketball shooting and coin pusher.
2: Every shot you make would give you a chance to roll the slots. Things are under your control.
3: Push coins off the board to gain amazing rewards.
4: Powerful and well-designed skills give you exclusive gameplay.

This game isn't like anyone you tried before. Download now and start making your shots.

This game does not cost any real money.
Playing this game does not imply future success in “Real Money Gambling”.
Apple Inc. does not sponsor, nor in any way affiliated with Happy Hoop.
